title: HOUR 1 - LeBron, Brady, Morant, Murray
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - LeBron, Brady, Morant, Murray
description:
This season will not define LeBron James

Tom Brady shouldn't be getting all the credit

Colin shares his concerns about Ja Morant

You're not hearing players defend Kyler Murray


Guest: Brevin Knight
